<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>To fix start state and end state values in Customer service state flows</description>
        <name>fixStateValuesInCSCaseFlow</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[fixStateValuesInCaseFlow();

function fixStateValuesInCaseFlow(){
          var stateValue = {};
          var sysChoiceforCase = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
          sysChoiceforCase.addQuery("name","sn_customerservice_case");
          sysChoiceforCase.addQuery("element","state");
          sysChoiceforCase.query();
          while(sysChoiceforCase.next()){
              stateValue[sysChoiceforCase.value] = sysChoiceforCase.sys_id.toString();
          }
          var caseSfRecord =  new GlideRecord("sn_customerservice_sf_case");
          caseSfRecord.query();
          while(caseSfRecord.next()){
              if(caseSfRecord.start_text)
              	caseSfRecord.starting_state.setValue(stateValue[caseSfRecord.start_text]);
              if(caseSfRecord.end_text)	
              	caseSfRecord.ending_state.setValue(stateValue[caseSfRecord.end_text]);
              caseSfRecord.update();
         }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
